general_conclusions: Decrease of RE3+ ionic radius monotonically decreases lattice constant a and in-plane Bi-S1 distance.
Decrease of RE3+ radius significantly decreases in-plane disorder of S1 sites.
Emergence of bulk superconductivity upon suppression of in-plane disorder is a universal scenario for BiCh2-based superconductors.
Amplitude of one-dimensional vibration of S1 along c-axis is correlated with Tc.
